text: Autoportrait (1940) Stefania Kulkowa Her Majesty Youth Bolesław Barbacki (October 10, 1891 – August 21, 1941) was a Polish painter. In World War II he was arrested by the Gestapo and shot. Category:20th-century Polish painters Category:20th-century male artists Category:1891 births Category:1941 deaths Category:Polish male painters
title: Bolesław Barbacki
